title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 (Section 

12A(2)) (Covid-19) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited redundancy payment act 1967 (section 12a(2)) (covid-19) order 2020

title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: 2. The 10th day of August 2020 is hereby specified as the date to which the
text_raw:
2. The 10th day of August 2020 is hereby specified as the date to which the 
emergency period, as defined in subsection (5) of section 12A (inserted by 
section 29 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 
2020 (No. 2 of 2020)) of the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 (No. 21 of 1967), 
shall be extended. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

29 May, 2020. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [193]
text_norm: 2 10th day august 2020 hereby specified date emergency period defined subsection (5) section 12a (inserted section 29 emergency measure public interest (covid-19) act 2020 (no 2 2020)) redundancy payment act 1967 (no 21 1967) shall extended given official seal government 29 may 2020 leo varadkar taoiseach 4 193

title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order extends, until 10 August 2020, the emergency period during which 
section 12 of the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 shall not have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [193] 5
